methods.getSharedRefreshService:
Get (and possibly construct) a shared instance.

:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.locations.util.TableDataRefreshService) The shared instance
methods.scheduleTableLocationProviderRefresh:
Schedule refresh for an AbstractTableLocationProvider.

:param tableLocationProvider: (io.deephaven.db.v2.locations.AbstractTableLocationProvider) - The table location provider
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.locations.util.TableDataRefreshService.CancellableSubscriptionToken) A subscription token to be used for matching, which also supports cancellation
methods.scheduleTableLocationRefresh:
Schedule refresh for an AbstractTableLocation.

:param tableLocation: (io.deephaven.db.v2.locations.AbstractTableLocation) - The table location
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.locations.util.TableDataRefreshService.CancellableSubscriptionToken) A subscription token to be used for matching, which also supports cancellation
methods.submitOneTimeAsyncTask:
Submit a one-time task to be run asynchronously.

:param task: (java.lang.Runnable) - The task to run

text: For TableDataService and related components, this allows a simple implementation for subscription support.
